entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
